entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 8:20PM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Dense fog at times mainly in the mountains... Watch for areas of dense fog tonight especially along the higher ridges, and including Interstate 77, the Blue Ridge Parkway and the Alleghany Highlands. Some visibilities will be as low as a few hundred feet. Patchy drizzle and light rain overnight will also add to the hazardous driving conditions.
